/usr/bin/cc   -Wall -pedantic   CMakeFiles/shapes.dir/progs/demos/shapes/shapes.c.o CMakeFiles/shapes.dir/progs/demos/shapes/glmatrix.c.o  -o bin/shapes -rdynamic -lGLU -lGL -lm -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lXxf86vm -lm lib/libglut.so.3.10.0 -lGL -lm -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lXxf86vm -Wl,-rpath,/home/hexagonaled/Graphics/freeglut-3.0.0/lib
